DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study learn effect various type simulation preparation method novice nurse ' competence self-efficacy . Participants recruit academic course ( N424 Integrated Practicum ) . Participants randomize three intervention group ( i.e . expert model video , voice PowerPoint , traditional reading ) . All participant complete self-efficacy survey two simulation . During simulation , participant score base competence accord performance rubric . The hypothesis participant expert model group demonstrate change competence report change self-efficacy score participant group .
DOC.detailed_description: Investigators compare self-confidence competence score three group pre-test posttest simulation . The self-efficacy survey 7-item scale involve participant rating self-efficacy provide care multiple patient . Participants rate self-efficacy 1 5 ( confident confident scale ) . The survey take 5 minute complete . The self-efficacy survey use many simulation research study previously novice nurse . Competence measure rater-observation measure previously use simulation research .
